welcome.description: is a comprehensive app for tracking gym workouts. Effortlessly manage your exercise routines, monitor your progress, and reach your fitness goals.
welcome.featuresDescription: Our platform offers top-notch features designed to help you achieve your fitness goals.

feature1.title: Track Your Progress
feature1.description: Keep a detailed log of your workouts and monitor your performance.

feature2.title: Custom Workouts
feature2.description: Create and save personalized workout routines tailored to your needs.

feature3.title: Stay Motivated
feature3.description: Receive tips and reminders to keep your motivation high.

feature4.title: Community Support
feature4.description: Join a community of like-minded individuals and share your journey.

feature5.title: Fitness Challenges
feature5.description: Participate in challenges to push your limits and stay engaged.

feature6.title: Nutrition Tracking
feature6.description: Monitor your dietary habits to complement your fitness goals.

feature7.title: Progress Insights
feature7.description: Gain insights into your progress with detailed analytics.

feature8.title: Live Classes
feature8.description: Join live workout classes to stay motivated and learn new techniques.

welcome.testimonial1: Gym Mate has completely changed the way I work out. I can track every set and see my progress!
welcome.testimonial2: The personalized workouts are exactly what I needed to stay consistent with my fitness goals.
welcome.tipsDescription: Here are some tips to help you get started:
welcome.faqDescription: Here are some common questions about Gym Mate:

faq1.question: How do I create a workout plan?
faq1.answer: You can create a workout plan by selecting exercises, setting goals, and saving your routine in the app.

faq2.question: Can I share my progress with friends?
faq2.answer: Yes! You can share your workout progress with friends and connect with the community.

faq3.question: What types of workouts can I track?
faq3.answer: You can track a variety of workouts, including strength training, cardio, flexibility exercises, and more.

faq4.question: Is there a mobile app available?
faq4.answer: Yes, our mobile app is available for both iOS and Android, allowing you to access your workouts on the go.

faq5.question: How can I reset my password?
faq5.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page, click on 'Forgot Password?', and follow the instructions sent to your email.

faq6.question: What should I do if I miss a workout?
faq6.answer: Don't worry! Just get back on track as soon as you can and adjust your schedule if needed.

welcome.blogDescription: Check out our latest articles for tips, workouts, and nutrition advice.
welcome.blogPost1Summary: Discover the advantages of incorporating strength training into your fitness routine.
welcome.blogPost2Summary: Learn how proper nutrition can enhance your workout performance.

userProfile.title: Profile
userProfile.description: View and manage your personal information.
